item.title: By: Rachel
item.dc:creator: Rachel
item.description: Note - I weighed 1 cup of pumpkin, and it was about 215 grams. I think 450 grams is probably about 2 cups of pumpkin.
item.content:encoded: Note – I weighed 1 cup of pumpkin, and it was about 215 grams. I think 450 grams is probably about 2 cups of pumpkin.

item.title: By: Alex G
item.dc:creator: Alex G
item.description: Sadly this doesn't work with tinned pumpkin. Made it and ended up with a massive solid inedible stodge.
item.content:encoded: Sadly this doesn’t work with tinned pumpkin. Made it and ended up with a massive solid inedible stodge.

item.title: By: Foodycat
item.dc:creator: Foodycat
item.description: I made this to have with our dinner tonight - it was lovely! It was so light, I was amazed! We had it with some chilli con carne and it was just perfect.
item.content:encoded: I made this to have with our dinner tonight – it was lovely! It was so light, I was amazed! We had it with some chilli con carne and it was just perfect.

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: the bread looks so dense yet so moist, and the colour of it is absolutely spectacular! Love it to bits!
item.content:encoded: the bread looks so dense yet so moist, and the colour of it is absolutely spectacular! Love it to bits!

item.title: By: Parita
item.dc:creator: Parita
item.description: Wow Anita the bread has baked beautifully, i have never tasted pumpkin baked goodies, this looks like savory version of the bread, can we make a sweet one too ?
item.content:encoded: Wow Anita the bread has baked beautifully, i have never tasted pumpkin baked goodies, this looks like savory version of the bread, can we make a sweet one too ?

item.title: By: grace
item.dc:creator: grace
item.description: when i saw the word "spicy," i thought you meant simply cinnamon, nutmeg, etc--the usual suspects. i'm thrilled that chili powder, paprika, and cumin are involved--great recipe!
item.content:encoded: when i saw the word “spicy,” i thought you meant simply cinnamon, nutmeg, etc–the usual suspects. i’m thrilled that chili powder, paprika, and cumin are involved–great recipe!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: That looks really pumpkiny, and it must be tasty with all those spices!
item.content:encoded: That looks really pumpkiny, and it must be tasty with all those spices!

item.title: By: Julia @ Mélanger
item.dc:creator: Julia @ Mélanger
item.description: Oh, I love pumpkin bread. And how great are pepitas? Yum!
item.content:encoded: Oh, I love pumpkin bread. And how great are pepitas? Yum!

item.title: By: Karen
item.dc:creator: Karen
item.description: I love pumpkin anything and this sounds amazing with the addition of the spices!
item.content:encoded: I love pumpkin anything and this sounds amazing with the addition of the spices!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: That looks delicious! I do a similar pumpkin bread that is sadly not quite as good for you as yours is hehe. perhpas I should try this one!
item.content:encoded: That looks delicious! I do a similar pumpkin bread that is sadly not quite as good for you as yours is hehe. perhpas I should try this one!
